alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 26 at 1:19PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...West-central Guam. * WHEN...Until 315 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 115 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy showers. Although thunder has not been reported, thunderstorms are possible. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chalan Pago-Ordot, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Asan, Piti and Santa Rita. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
